write-spec.description: Create requirements.md from user input. Use when writing specifications, defining requirements, creating user stories.

write-design.description: Create design.md from requirements. Use when designing architecture, planning technical implementation, defining system design.

write-tasks.description: Create tasks.md from design. Use when breaking down work, creating task lists, planning implementation steps.

execute-tasks.description: Execute tasks from tasks.md. Use when implementing features, writing code, building functionality.

quick-implement.description: Quick implementation without full specs for small features. Use for simple features, prototypes, experiments.

refine-spec.description: Refine and improve existing specifications. Use when updating requirements, clarifying specs, improving documentation.

research-prd.description: Research and create PRD for iOS/mobile apps. Use when analyzing market, competitors, defining features, writing product requirements.
